Header: Karuna Amman ordered to appear before Police FCID every month
Content: Colombo Chief Magistrate Lal Ranasinghe issued an order on February 01 calling on former Deputy Minister Vinayagamoorthy Muralitharan alias Karuna Amman to appear before the Police FCID on the last Sunday of every month. The Former Deputy Minister has been charged for misusing a vehicle worth Rs.90 million which was provided for his security, during his tenure. The FCID informed court on January 01 that the investigation report on the alleged misuse has been submitted to the Attorney Generalâ€™s Department.The case is to be taken up before Court again on May 24.
